name: Silent Hill 5
summary: Silent Hill 5 is a cancelled title in the Silent Hill series that was in development by Team Silent after Silent Hill 4: The Room. The game was planned to be set in daylight and include a form of daylight horror, featuring the town with people, etc. The game was also intended to be similar to the first three installments with a story reminiscent of Silent Hill 2. The game was cancelled by Konami, and Team Silent was disbanded around the same time.
